text:
There are large variety of different dishes/foods can be found here. Glad that they have make some renovation here and there, some new stalls too.
Good portion of food and easily to be full eating here, but just a lil bit pricey.
Overall, foods and service here was good. The staff here was very kind, fast and polite (good in customer service.)
Loves their seafood and many more...
There's no regrets when coming here. â™¡â™¡â™¡

Avoid this store! they scammed us!

I ordered a plain + egg prata and a cheese hotdog prata. When I went to pay, the total came to $8.80, which seemed a bit high compared to other places, so I asked for a breakdown. The man claimed the plain + egg prata was $3.30, which was fine. However, he then said I ordered a cheese hotdog with egg prata for $5.50?! The cheese hotdog alone costs $4, and the egg is $1.50.

I made it clear that I didnâ€™t order the cheese hotdog with egg prata, and when I looked at my prata, there was no sign of egg in it. There wasnâ€™t the distinct yellow/orange colour of egg yolk, nothing. He charged me an extra $1.50 for something I didnâ€™t get, effectively stealing from me.

This kind of dishonest pricing is unacceptable, and I would strongly advise against patronizing this shop. They misled us, overcharged, and didnâ€™t even provide the food they claimed to serve. Please be cautious if you decide to visit.

Bog-standard place and food. From my perspective, ever since the reopening, food quality and service has gone downhill.

The food served here was nothing but mediocre, there was nothing special about the Mee Bakso despite the outrageous price. $9.90 for something so unremarkable. ðŸ«·The Indian food stall too was forgettable, despite its affordability . Not to mention stall named MANNA, portion and quality can be improved as it is not worth $9.90 for ala carte meals, itâ€™s average just like any other western stalls, no specialty.
Ordered Nasi with Dried Chilli Chicken. Taste good . price decent too. Probably good space to lepak as there are various of shops within Rasa-Rasa itself providing different delicacies!

Kebab & BBQ

Ordered the Kebab Fries. $9.90! But that's not the point. I'm ok to spend on food. But asking for more chilli sauce, the sales staff tell me to pay additional $1. . . Lol... on the contrary , the western beside it have their chilli sauce place ourself to let customer take freely.

Prices already on the high side but ask for chilli sauce still need $1.. first and the last time.
